trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link"></xref> adapter class for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link"></xref>适配器类，该类为无线标记语言 (WML) 设备适配器集。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlLinkAdapter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回关联控件的强类型化的引用。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 对关联控件的强类型化的引用。

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: 生成了控件适配器附加到控件的特定于目标的标记。
此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收输出的文本编写器。
